com.latentview.koalas.common

Class DataFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.latentview.koalas.common.DataFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable

    public class DataFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable
    Tabular data structure with labeled axes (rows and columns).
    Author:
    GokulRamesh,Sureshkrishna

        public DataFrame(java.util.List<Series> seriesList,
         java.util.List<java.lang.Object> index,
         java.lang.Boolean trans)
        To Create a DataFrame given list of rows as list of series and header as list of objects
        Parameters:
        seriesList - list of series which is list of rows
        index - list of objects which is header
        trans - Always 'true'. Just to differentiate between rows and columns input type
